New Records: Freddie Freeman hit a 10th-inning walk-off grand slam in Game 1
Yoshinobu Yamamoto recorded 19 outs in Game 2 and allowed just one hit
Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman's 10th-inning walk-off grand slam in Game 1
Yoshinobu Yamamoto's strong outing in Game 2
Shohei Ohtani exiting in the seventh inning with an apparent shoulder injury
Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between the two rival teams
The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The showdown between Clayton Kershaw and Mookie Betts was highly anticipated
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed disappointment in his performance
Dave Roberts highlighted the team's resilience after the comeback win
The coach emphasized the importance of staying focused and playing to their strengths
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in dramatic fashion
The short porch in right will benefit the Dodgers as much as it has the Yankees all season
The teams play three straight days, which could be challenging for the Dodgers' bullpen
Others: The series will shift to New York for Game 3, which could change the dynamics of the game
